description: Datadog is a hosted monitoring service for cloud-scale infrastructure and applications
name: datadog
postInstallNotes:
Datadog on DCOS successfully installed.
Head over to https://app.datadoghq.com to monitor your DCOS cluster.
preInstallNotes:
This package installs the new Agent 6 by default. You can revert to Agent 5 by enabling datadog.use_agent_5.

Pass your API key as a package option (datadog.api_key), which you can find at https://app.datadoghq.com/account/settings#api

Also pass the number of Mesos slaves as an option (datadog.instances), Marathon will make sure that the Datadog Agent runs only once per slave.

See https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-agent/blob/master/Dockerfiles/agent/README.md for available options.
